title: How to Draw the WWE Logo

steps.headline: Draw the large W.
steps.description: Make sure the W's do not overlap. Don't stress too much. Just let your hand flow free.

steps.headline: Draw the small W.
steps.description: Draw the smaller W, remembering to leave some space between the both the W's.

steps.headline: Underline it with a red marker.
steps.description: Make sure not to draw a long line.

steps.headline: Admire your WWE logo.
steps.description: Use the paper as a stencil to draw the logo on the fabric.

text: Draw the large W. Make sure the W's do not overlap. Don't stress too much. Just let your hand flow free. Draw the small W. Draw the smaller W, remembering to leave some space between the both the W's. Underline it with a red marker. Make sure not to draw a long line. Admire your WWE logo. Use the paper as a stencil to draw the logo on the fabric.
sentences: Draw the large W. Make sure the W's do not overlap.
Just let your hand flow free.
Draw the small W. Draw the smaller W, remembering to leave some space between the both the W's.
Underline it with a red marker.
Make sure not to draw a long line.
Use the paper as a stencil to draw the logo on the fabric.
